import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link,useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Moviedetails = () => { useState[Moviedetails,setmovie]=useState([]); const params=useParams(); const getmoviedata=async()=> { const res=await axios.get(`https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/${params.id}?api_key=872b6f6702d22707bd5586523dc92a11 &language=ar`) setMoviess(res.data) } return (
) } export default Moviedetails
